fillList() - Method in class Funds.Tools.GeneralLedger.LedgerPane

fillLists() - Method in class Funds.Tools.Budgeting.RevenueSplitter.RevenueSplitter
internal method for filling up list of available accounts, has to be public to use with fxml
findAutomaticPercents() - Method in class Funds.Tools.Budgeting.RevenueSplitter.RevenueSplitter
subtracts any non-automatic percents from one-hundred and then divides the remaining percentage evenly among the automatic items

The recalculated balance for every Transaction (transaction) recorded in this account
findType(String) - Method in class Funds.BalanceTree.BalanceTreeContextMenu
converts a localString, such as from a button label, to an enumerated AccountType
FundController - Class in Funds
The controller class for the software's main GUI

FundMain - Class in Funds

FundMain() - Constructor for class Funds.FundMain
 
Funds - package Funds
The .java and .fxml files relating to the primary Graphical User Interface for this application.
Funds.DataEnums - package Funds.DataEnums
The enumerated types used to categorize the data used in this project
Funds.DataObjects - package Funds.DataObjects
The actual Java bean style data organizing classes for this project
Funds.Dialogs - package Funds.Dialogs
In an attempt to minimize clutter that typically comes along with GUI's on accounting software most user interaction is handled via dialog boxes and this package holds all of the .java controllers and .fxml GUI's in an attempt to keep this mess of files somewhat organized.
Funds.Tools.BookExport - package Funds.Tools.BookExport
At times it is necessary to send data from a program elsewhere for processing, this object allows data to exported in the four most common formats for transferring and handling data: XML, JSON, CSV, SQL.
Funds.Tools.Budgeting.RevenueSplitter - package Funds.Tools.Budgeting.RevenueSplitter
Revenue often comes in as one lump sum but needs distributed to a number of accounts this tool performs the calculations when these distributions are percentage based
Funds.Tools.GeneralLedger - package Funds.Tools.GeneralLedger
By the nature of accounting software it may remain in use for quite some time, which means that the list of transactions being tracked can grow quite extensive, this tool provides filter and view options for sorting through the list of transactions recorded in the book.
